title: CallbackShortcuts
subtitle: Using built-in widgets for common keyboard actions.

leftBullets.title: No Boilerplate Needed
leftBullets.description: For simple actions, no need in `Action` and `Intent` classes.

leftBullets.title: `CallbackShortcuts` Widget
leftBullets.description: Directly binds a key press (or shortcut) to a simple `VoidCallback` function.

leftBullets.title: Quick and Easy
leftBullets.description: Perfect for triggering a single, self-contained function.

leftBullets.title: Still Requires Focus
leftBullets.description: Like all other input widgets, its child must be focused to receive the key events.

leftBullets.title: Wrapper over Focus
leftBullets.description: Under the hood, it uses a `Focus` widget
